content:

author: potuz
content: Please don't, I agree this channel should be kept lean, but threads are not shown on lookups and if you're not at the right time then you miss an entire discussion. This channel is not for announcements either, we have <#595701770034872362> we just need to be conscious of what gets here and what doesn't, but threads are for the most part an annoyance in Discord

author: marek_celo
content: This would be a huge help for us. Celo's testnets use Holeksy because of an EigenDA dependency, and migrating them over is in it of itself a huge pain, but to do that twice in one year with Sepolia's deprecation plans would be a double pain. Extending Holesky's lifespan to overlap with Sepolia's successor solves this problem.
